category.title: IEEE Spectrum Reports
category.description: Select videos from Spectrum, the flagship publication of IEEE. News and features about the latest technology, engineering, and science advances.

category.title: IEEE Access
category.description: Select IEEE Access videos, IEEE Access launched in 2013 as the first open access mega journal in the growing IEEE open access publishing program. The scope of this allelectronic, archival publication comprises all IEEE fields of interest, emphasizing applicationsoriented and interdisciplinary articles.

category.title: IEEE.tv Specials
category.description: Global highlights of IEEE activities including featured events, standards, and profiles of significant figures in technology and engineering. Features include Tech Tours, Profiles in Volunteering, coverage of Smart Grid and other IEEE initiatives.

category.title: Educational Activities
category.description: Select videos from Educational Activities group

category.title: Technical Tours
category.description: Take a field trip with IEEE.tv visit engineering marvels and marvelous workplaces and tech resources for engineers.

category.title: Meet the Authors
category.description: Oneonone interviews with leading experts in the field. Meet the authors of conference papers, technical articles, IEEE books and eBooks.

category.title: IEEE Products
category.description: Brief introductions to IEEE products and initiatives. From IEEE Xplore Digital Library to financial services products, this series covers the wide range of products offered to members and to the public.

category.title: History
category.description: With many programs produced in conjunction with IEEE History Center, this series highlights landmark technology and engineering events from the past. IEEE members central role in electrical science and technology provides a unique historic perspective.

category.title: Careers
category.description: Current events including technology careers, profiles of interesting jobs and new developments in technical disciplines. Learn about tomorrows jobs today.

category.title: Marketplace
category.description: Sponsored videos showcase IEEE products and services as well as commercial technology solutions. Leading technology vendors demonstrate the latest engineering solutions.
